properties.name: Auraria Campus
properties.description: Posted by StrongwindsaheadAuraria Campus will be used by the Dems for many of their activities. We know they reserved almost all the spaces available for meetings and gatherings. As more detailed information becomes available, we will let you know. Auraria is the largest campus in Colorado, where three separate higher education institutions enroll approximately 38,000 students. Community College of Denver, The Metropolitan State College of Denver and the University of Colorado at Denver and Health Sciences Center Downtown Denver Campus share classroom space and general services on the commuter campus, located in the heart of downtown.
